Query.Sql: select distinct d.AccidentAndEmergencyDiagnosis, ae.GeneratedRecordIdentifier, ae.NHSNumber, ae.ArrivalDate, ae.ArrivalTime from omop_staging.sus_AE_diagnosis d inner join omop_staging.sus_AE ae on d.MessageId = ae.MessageId where ae.NHSNumber is not null and d.AccidentAndEmergencyDiagnosis in ('30','301')

Explanation.Description: CDS specific identifier that binds multiple CDS messages together.
The time (using a 24 hour clock) that is of relevance to an ACTIVITY.
Explanation.Origin: ARRIVAL TIME AT ACCIDENT AND EMERGENCY DEPARTMENT

Explanation.Description: ACCIDENT AND EMERGENCY DIAGNOSIS is a six character code, comprising: Diagnosis Condition n2 Sub-Analysis n1 ACCIDENT AND EMERGENCY ANATOMICAL AREA n2 ACCIDENT AND EMERGENCY ANATOMICAL SIDE
